entry.def: If an issue or a crisis is internationalized, it becomes the concern of many nations throughout the world.

example.ex: A very real danger exists of the conflict becoming internationalised...
example.tran: 这一冲突实际上很有可能演变成国际化问题。

example.ex: They have been trying to internationalise the Kashmir problem.
example.tran: 他们一直想使克什米尔问题国际化。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of bringing something under international control

auth_sentence.content: The rapid internationalization of the Web stems in part from one-upsmanship among the behemoths.
